Package me.abetgt.nmsvillager.listeners

Class VillagerTradeListener

java.lang.Object
me.abetgt.nmsvillager.listeners.VillagerTradeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class VillagerTradeListener extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Performs all of the logic needed to trigger the, cancelable, custom VillagerTradeListener.VillagerTradeEvent.

    • areStackable

      @Contract("null,null->true") public static boolean areStackable(@Nullable @Nullable org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack a, @Nullable @Nullable org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack b)
      Calculates if the given stacks are of the exact same item thus could be stacked.
      Returns:
      true - stacks can be combined (assuming a max stack size > 1).
